article.headline: Ohio 67, E. Michigan 61
article.story: ATHENS, Ohio (AP) -- Jerome Tillman had 19 points and 10 rebounds, and Leon Williams added 18 points and 17 rebounds to lead Ohio to a 67-61 win over Eastern Michigan on Wednesday night. The Bobcats (13-6, 4-2 Mid-American Conference) used an 11-0 run to build an 11-point lead in the first half and a second 11-0 spurt early in the second half after the Eagles (7-12, 2-4) pulled within six. Devon Dumes led Eastern Michigan with 19 points and went 5-for-11 from 3-point range. Brandon Bowdry added 13 points and Carlos Medlock scored 10 for the Eagles, who missed 21 of 30 3-point attempts. Whitney Davis added 13 points for Ohio, which was 1-for-13 beyond the arc. Ohio hit just 43 percent from the field, but Eastern Michigan shot only 37 percent. Tillman scored seven points in Ohio's first 11-0 surge, which gave the Bobcats a 23-12 lead with 7:16 remaining in the first half. Ohio led 36-29 at the half. Leading 38-32 with 18:24 remaining, the Bobcats scored 11 straight points to take their largest lead of the game at 49-32 with 11:30 to play. Sonny Troutman scored five of his nine points for Ohio in that run. After Eastern Michigan closed within six again at 63-57, Troutman and Tillman each made two free throws for a 10-point lead with 1:33 left.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
